name: Beast ball
description:
A rougelike game

Made in 6 days During my exams :)

Controls

  • Wasd or arrows - Move
  • Lshift - dash
  • Lalt - shoot
  • Space - shield
  • Stunn - not available 

Tips and Info

  • Survive 1000 secs to win
  • Avoid death of walls, ai will cover you and not let you move
  • Kill each enemies .. To win you have to kill all enemies in the field . 
  • Avoid running from them
  • Shield only work from lasers. FastAttack enemies can damage you either you shield or not
  • To kill laserAttack enemies easily, move around them and shoot
  • Dash frequently to make the speed
  • Use shield when need or wisely, it can take long to cooldown and slow your speed 

Enemies 

laserAttack enemies will die in 5 hits and damage you 15 or more each hit and FastAttack enemies die at 2 hits and damage you 4 each attack
